item.description:
Hi folks, make sure you come to Your Bridge to Wealth on Tuesday February 3, 2010 at 6:30 pm!

Learn the TOP TAX TIPS FOR 2010 WITH CPA JOE CRAFT!

Joe H. Craft CPA, PFS, CFP, is a Certified Public Accountant and handles the preparation of financial statements, corporate and personal tax returns, audit defense and representation. His expertise also extends into estate and gift tax planning, comprehensive and segmented personal financial planning.

He has prepared thousands of tax returns and held positions with Deloitte Haskins & Sells CPAs, Price Waterhouse CPAs handling tax planning and tax reporting of closely held corporations to SEC companies and currently has his own tax firm. He has also been a frequent speaker on tax related and financial planning topics to large groups across the country and currently holds the position of Chief Financial Officer for Financial Destination, Inc. He is a member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and has received certification as a Certified Financial Planner and Personal Financial Specialist.

Joe is also the author of “Annual Record Keeping Kit for Small & Home Based Businesses” and co-author of “It’s How Much You Keep That Counts!” in its 4th edition.

He plans to share a wealth of knowlege with us and will give you some tips to help you keep your finances on track!

Joe Craft is my (Bernadette Trafton) for my personal and business finances and his expertise and knowledge has helped me tremendously over the last 3 1/2 years!

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Top Tax Tips for 2010 - with CPA Joe Craft!
